reviewText: The first movie from Africa I watched turned out to be one of my favorites of all time. The plot is so good that it needs no special effects or overtly carnal content to carry it, the drama and twists in the movie will glue you to the screen.
I love this movie, andI am very satisfied with the manner in which it was shipped!

This item came in perfect and new condition. I was having a difficult time finding this movie and was very happy to find it. The movie has an excellent story line with a very good ending.. you can't just watch it once. Darkness of Sorrow is one of my very favorites and is highly recommended.
I enjoyed every minute of this movie.  Did not care too much for the part with the violence, so I fast fwd that part.  I consider this movie as one of my favorites.  Love the actors and actress too
